alert.note: Alert for Yuma County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued April 11 at 1:37PM MDT until April 12 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Strong northwesterly winds in the wake of a cold frontal passage Tuesday afternoon. * WHERE...Yuma county in Colorado. Dundy, Hitchcock, and Red Willow counties in Nebraska. Cheyenne and Rawlins counties in northwest Kansas. * WHEN...Late Tuesday morning through Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...Hazardous travel conditions associated with strong winds and (potentially) blowing dust. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong northwesterly winds in the wake of the cold frontal passage is the primary concern within the Watch area.
info.instruction: Secure loose outdoor items and stay tuned for later forecasts and possible warnings.
